SENT.plain: Burkitt's lymphoma of the thyroid gland is a rare malignancy
We present a case of a 58-year-old female who developed a rapid enlargement of her thyroid gland
Core biopsy confirmed the diagnosis of Burkitt's lymphoma
The tumour resolved after three cycles of chemotherapy

This case report emphasises the importance of considering lymphoma when dealing with thyroid nodules and goitres, as its management is different from that of other thyroid pathologies and delaying treatment has an impact on prognosis
